body:
type=proposal_ready
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:31:34.646Z:6b47d090
summary=Analyzed mixaroo-lite codebase (TypeScript CLI, v1.0.0, ~500 LOC). Created: (1) GTM strategy with AARRR model, 12-week timeline, competitive analysis — deliverables/gtm-strategy.md, (2) Pre-flight checklist with blocking/before-launch/nice-to-have items — deliverables/preflight-checklist.md, (3) Team proposal: 4 roles (developer, qa, content-writer, data-analyst) — .team/team-proposal.json. Phase transitioned setup→discovery. All artifacts committed and pushed.
